data.name: Pear
dialogue: Hey! Did you know that the Ragdoll gamepass does more than it should do?
A lot of events actually become a piece of cake once you do it, and I heard it even prevents you from no-clipping...
Just don't try it though during a flood! You might regret it~!
In the meantime though, Noble's probably planning on fixing it.. maybe.

data.name: Pear
dialogue: Hey! Are you tired of the driver spamming the horn and you no longer want to hear it anymore?
You can mute the Bus Horn by going to the <highlight>Audio Settings</highlight>, and muting Environment Sounds!

data.name: Pear
dialogue: Hey! Are you tired of someone spamming the <highlight>Airhorn</highlight> and you no longer want to hear it anymore?
You can mute the <highlight>Airhorn</highlight> by going to the <highlight>Audio Settings</highlight>, and muting Tool Sounds!

data.name: Pear
dialogue: Hey! Did you know that you can instantly befriend Frost with this one simple trick?
All you need is a special... exclusive...
Funnily enough, this actually ends up making Frostbite confused enough to think you gave him a special 'token' of-
Y-yeah! All you need is to get lucky enough!
Hopefully by then though, you didn't give him a normal ice cream~.
